00022 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport.h"
00023 //
00024 #include "chipstream/QuantGTypeMethod.h"
00025 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodSqlExprReport.h"
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport(const std::string &databaseFile, const std::string &callTable, const std::string &confTable, int maxNameLength) {
00030   m_CallDbFileName = databaseFile + ".call" + ".db";
00031   m_ConfDbFileName = databaseFile + ".conf" + ".db";
00032   m_CallTable = callTable;
00033   m_CallMetaTable = callTable + "_meta";
00034   m_ConfTable = confTable;
00035   m_ConfMetaTable = confTable + "_meta";
00036   m_MaxPsNameLength = maxNameLength;
00037   int status = 0;
00038   if ((status =  sqlite3_open(m_CallDbFileName.c_str(), &m_CallDb)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00039     Err::errAbort("Couldn't open database: " + m_CallDbFileName + " got error code: " + ToStr(status));
00040   }
00041   if ((status =  sqlite3_open(m_ConfDbFileName.c_str(), &m_ConfDb)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00042     Err::errAbort("Couldn't open database: " + m_ConfDbFileName + " got error code: " + ToStr(status));
00043   }
00044 }
00045 
00046 QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::~QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport() {
00047   int status = 0;
00048   // Close the sqlite database 
00049   if ((status = sqlite3_close(m_CallDb)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00050    Verbose::warn(0, "Error trying to close the database with error code: " + ToStr(status));
00051   }
00052   if ((status = sqlite3_close(m_ConfDb)) != SQLITE_OK) {
00053    Verbose::warn(0, "Error trying to close the database with error code: " + ToStr(status));
00054   }
00055 }
00056 
00057 bool QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00058   string sql = "begin transaction;";
00059   createCallTable(m_CallDb, m_CallTable, iMart);
00060   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_CallDb, sql);
00061   createConfTable(m_ConfDb, m_ConfTable, iMart);
00062   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_ConfDb, sql);
00063   return true;
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, 
00067                                        QuantMethod &qMethod, 
00068                                        const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00069                                        std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00070                                        PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00071   static char buf[256];
00072   static string delim = ",";
00073   QuantGTypeMethod *gMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantGTypeMethod *>(&qMethod);
00074   if(gMethod == NULL) {
00075     Err::errAbort("Can only use a QuantMethodGTypeReport with QuantGTypeMethods.");
00076   }
00077   std::string name = gMethod->getProbeSetName();
00078   int targetCount = gMethod->getNumCalls();
00079 
00080   string insertCalls = "insert into " + m_CallTable + " values ( '" + psGroup.name + "' ";
00081   string insertConf = "insert into " + m_ConfTable + " values ( '" + psGroup.name + "' ";
00082   for(int i = 0; i < targetCount; i++) {
00083     snprintf(buf, ArraySize(buf), "%.3g", gMethod->getConfidence(i));
00084     insertConf += delim + buf;
00085     insertCalls += delim + ToStr((int)gMethod->getCall(i));
00086   }
00087   insertCalls += ");";
00088   insertConf  += ");";
00089   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_CallDb, insertCalls);
00090   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_ConfDb, insertConf);
00091   return true;
00092 }
00093 
00094 void QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::createConfTable(sqlite3 *db, const std::string &tableName, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00095   string createSql = "create table " + tableName + " ( probeset_id varchar(" + ToStr(m_MaxPsNameLength) + "), ";
00096   for(int i = 0; i < iMart.getCelFileNames().size(); i++) {
00097     createSql += " '" + iMart.getCelFileNames()[i] + "' real ";
00098     if(i + 1 != iMart.getCelFileNames().size()) {
00099       createSql += ",";
00100     }
00101   }
00102   createSql += " );";
00103   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(db, createSql);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::createCallTable(sqlite3 *db, const std::string &tableName, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00107   string createSql = "create table " + tableName + " ( probeset_id varchar(" + ToStr(m_MaxPsNameLength) + ") , ";
00108   for(int i = 0; i < iMart.getCelFileNames().size(); i++) {
00109     createSql += " '" + iMart.getCelFileNames()[i] + "' integer(1) ";
00110     if(i + 1 != iMart.getCelFileNames().size()) {
00111       createSql += ",";
00112     }
00113   }
00114   createSql += " );";
00115   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(db, createSql);
00116 }
00117 
00118 void QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::createMetaTable(sqlite3 *db, const std::string &metaTableName) {
00119   string createSql = "create table " + metaTableName + " ( key varchar(256), value text ); ";
00120   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(db, createSql);
00121 }
00122 
00123 void QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::addStdHeaders(QuantMethodReport *qReport,
00124                                              const std::string& execGuid, 
00125                                              const std::string& reportGuid,
00126                                              const std::string& timeStr,
00127                                              const std::string& commandLine,
00128                                               const std::string& execVersion,
00129                                              const AnalysisInfo& info) {
00130   std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator keyIx, paramIx;
00131   createMetaTable(m_CallDb, m_CallMetaTable);
00132   createMetaTable(m_ConfDb, m_ConfMetaTable);
00133   //
00134   for(keyIx = info.m_ParamNames.begin(), paramIx = info.m_ParamValues.begin();
00135       keyIx != info.m_ParamNames.end() && paramIx != info.m_ParamValues.end();
00136       ++keyIx, ++paramIx) {
00137     string sql = "insert into " + m_CallMetaTable + " values ( '" + *keyIx + "', '" + *paramIx + "');";
00138     QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_CallDb, sql);
00139     sql = "insert into " + m_ConfMetaTable + " values ( '" + *keyIx + "', '" + *paramIx + "');";
00140     QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_ConfDb, sql);
00141   }
00142 }
00143 
00144 bool QuantMethodSqlGTypeReport::finish(QuantMethod &qMethod) {
00145   string sql = "commit;";
00146   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_CallDb, sql);
00147   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_ConfDb, sql);
00148 
00149   string indexCalls = "create index call_index on call (probeset_id);";
00150   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_CallDb,  indexCalls);
00151 
00152   string indexConf = "create index confidence_index on confidence (probeset_id);";
00153   QuantMethodSqlExprReport::execute(m_ConfDb,  indexConf);
00154   return true;
00155 }
